description.value: You pray to Verena to expand the conscience of a suspected criminal, forcing them to fully comprehend the scope and harm of their actions. If your target committed a crime or has the @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.r180vP86SlwyJc8W]{Criminal} Talent, your prayer leaves your target keenly aware of injustice and tyranny. Whilst under the effects of this Miracle, the target must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test to commit a crime or suddenly be overwhelmed with guilt. If the target fails by -4 SL or more they break down sobbing and begging for forgiveness, and gain +1 @Condition[Blinded] and @Condition[Stunned] Conditions.Â
